column17:
The Sax Soap is a gentle soap prepared for daily cleansing of your skin. It helps in hydrating and slightly aromatizing your skin rendering it a cherishing pleasant fragrance. It doesn't alter the level of moisture content already present in your skin. Usage of this soap on a daily basis will help your body to maintain its moisture level currently present on your skin. This soap can be used on any skin it doesn't matter if you have oily or dry skin just use it and enjoy the feel of its aroma.
